packages_hero_description.value: From romantic getaways to family adventures, discover our carefully crafted packages that combine luxury, culture, and unforgettable experiences along the eternal Nile.
packages_hero_description.title: Packages Hero Description

itineraries_hero_subtitle.value: Journey Through Time on the Eternal Nile
itineraries_hero_subtitle.title: Itineraries Hero Subtitle

itineraries_hero_description.value: Explore our carefully crafted itineraries that take you through 5000 years of Egyptian history. Each journey is designed to immerse you in the wonders of ancient civilization while enjoying modern luxury aboard our traditional dahabiyas.
itineraries_hero_description.title: Itineraries Hero Description

itineraries_no_itineraries_description.value: We couldn't find any itineraries matching your criteria. Please adjust your filters or contact us to create a custom journey just for you.
itineraries_no_itineraries_description.title: No Itineraries Description

packages_hero_subtitle.value: Curated Experiences for Every Type of Traveler
packages_hero_subtitle.title: Packages Hero Subtitle

dahabiyas_hero_subtitle.value: Traditional Sailing Vessels with Modern Luxury
dahabiyas_hero_subtitle.title: Dahabiyas Hero Subtitle

dahabiyas_hero_description.value: Experience the timeless elegance of traditional Egyptian sailing boats, meticulously restored and equipped with modern amenities for the ultimate Nile journey.
dahabiyas_hero_description.title: Dahabiyas Hero Description
